content.p: comparisons are quite easy to implement, they are done almost automatically. In selenium there is the commandcaptureEntirePageScreenshot. The second parameter specifies the imagefilename. If a reference image exists, it will be automatically compared with the reference image. You can find all Screenshot comparisons under the "screenshot" section. The first column displays the recently captured image. The second column displays the reference image. The third column displays the diff image, it will mark all differences in red
By clicking on the X, the images will bedeleted. In the first picture there is also a checkmark. This action allows you to replace the current reference Image with the imagerecently captured.
Screenshot comparison are automatic triggered, when a reference image and a actual screenshot exists. Screenshots are taken by the captureEntirePageScreenshot selenese command .

When you hover over the images, you see some action buttons. By clicking on the chain you open the image in a new window btw tab.
By clicking on the checkmark, you copy the actual image as new reference image for the image comparison in the feature.
By clicking on the cross you delete the immage.
